A series of dramatic television presentations.
designed to make students aware of our
political process end of the way they can
participate in this process . . .now and
later. These dramatizations were produced
by the 21-Inch Classroom. The television
teacher is Dr. Franklin Patterson, President of
Hampshire College, in Massachusetts. The
area of politics treated in the series, as
distinguished from government, lies in the
election of our governmental officials.
The four 15-minute programs tell the story
of a young candidate for the office of state
representative. . . an ordinary man with no
previous political experience. Each lesson
